replies.body: So it's still a little hard to understand exactly what's happening here, but my best guess is that you see the League logo and then it disappears without opening? If that's the case, setup your [**permissions**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) again with that guide and you should be good to go.
You have to provide more details {{sticker:sg-lux-2}}

i got finished playing a match but never made it to the post game menu? it just closed out i guess. 
and now it wont open at all
